API Reference
=============

##########
git module
##########

This module includes all calls to the `git wrapper`_.

.. _git wrapper: https://github.com/gitpython-developers/GitPython/

   :members:
   :special-members:
   :private-members:


##########
gpg module
##########

.. _gnupg wrapper: https://bitbucket.org/vinay.sajip/python-gnupg

   :members:

   :private-members:
